Attributes.description: Phasor analysis and AC three phase systems power; transfer functions; Bode plots; filters and resonance; Laplace transforms; transformers and mutual inductance; two-port networks. First and second order circuits.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of PHYS 158, MATH 101 and one of ELEC 201, ELEC 203 and one of MATH 255, MATH 256.
